articles.description: The footballer's car left the road due to a tyre blow out while overtaking another car; Jota's brother also died in the crash.
articles.title: Liverpool forward Diogo Jota dies in car crash

articles.description: England face India in the second Test at Edgbaston - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India cricket LIVE: Second Test, day two, Edgbaston - score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Watch live coverage from day four of Wimbledon featuring Novak Djokovic, Iga Swiatek, Jannik Sinner and Jack Draper.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Pinnington Jones vs Cobolli, Andreeva vs Bronzetti on day four - watch live, listen to radio, text updates & latest scores

articles.description: Watch BBC TV coverage and follow live text updates as Belgium face Italy in the UEFA Women's Euro 2025.
articles.title: Belgium vs Italy LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 score, line-ups, TV stream & updates

articles.description: George Russell says he "doesn't think I'll be going anywhere" amid links between his Mercedes team and Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Briitsh Grand Prix: George Russell 'doesn't think I'll be going anywhere'

articles.description: Diogo Jota was on his way to take a ferry and return to Liverpool pre-season training when he died in a car accident, BBC Sport has been told.
articles.title: Diogo Jota death: Liverpool forward was on way to get ferry for pre-season training

articles.description: Owen Farrell's call-up by father Andy will not only dominate the headlines, but also bring a new sharpness to the British and Irish Lions' preparations for the Wallabies, writes Mike Henson.
articles.title: Owen Farrell: British and Irish Lions call-up 'adds more intensity to Australia tour'

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar will begin this year's Tour de France as the strong favourite to win cycling's greatest race for a fourth time - but will anyone stop him?
articles.title: Tour de France 2025: Tadej Pogacar is chasing a fourth win - who are his main rivals?

articles.description: Seven-time champion Novak Djokovic beats Dan Evans in what could be the British veteran's final appearance on Wimbledon's Centre Court.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Novak Djokovic outclasses Dan Evans, Jack Pinnington Jones beaten by Flavio Cobolli

articles.description: Diogo Jota, who died in a car crash aged 28, has been described as a symbol of hope and inspiration by Portugal football expert Marcus Alves.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Liverpool's Portuguese forward was an example of hope and optimism to his nation
